TopicTitle: where should i send all these crash reports?

Articles.Content: doesnt seem to matter if i use the GME or run the mods straight, i cant launch anything mixing stock with addon parts.

Hi EffoTio, It\'s probably best if you make a new topic in the Support section, and attach your crash reports there for people to see, that way you are more assured a proper response.

We might be able to help figure out your problem from the reports themselves, but a full system rundown and your dxdiag logs (if applicable) would help a lot as well.
